3 Ways A Car Accident Law Firm in Harlem Can Help You

Protecting The Rights of Accident Victims - Insurance companies often try to trick you into agreeing to a low settlement as fast as possible. When you hire an attorney, they handle all communication with the insurance company, so you do not need to worry about being taken advantage of.

No Upfront Legal Costs - Most car accident lawyers work on a contingency fee basis, which means you only pay when your case is won. There are not any up-front fees for legal services. Once your award is granted, a percentage of that will be used for legal fees.

Maximize Your Injury Settlement - The insurance company will try to minimize or deny your claim for compensation in any way they can. Their goal is to pay you the least amount possible, but you deserve maximum compensation for your losses. With the help of a car accident lawyer, you will receive the settlement amount that you deserve.

6 Steps To Take Immediately After Motor Vehicle Accident In Harlem

Call The Police - Anytime you’re involved in a car accident, it’s crucial to call the police before leaving the accident scene. This will ensure that the accident is documented properly and the at-fault party is cited for the accident.

Take Detailed Pictures of the Accident Scene - If you have the opportunity, try to take photos of the accident scene. Take pictures of the damages to your vehicle, the road conditions, and any visible injuries that you may have sustained. These pictures can help significantly when preparing your case.

Get Skilled Medical Care - You should always get examined by an experienced local auto accident chiropractor after being involved in a car accident. Chiropractors are experts at diagnosing and treating many different types of accident injuries. Make sure you get examined as soon as possible; putting off treatment can drastically affect the outcome of your case.

Follow Your Treatment Plan - Make sure you follow the treatment plan you are given. Do not miss appointments or forego recommended treatments. If you do not follow your treatment plan, the insurance company will minimize your claim or try to deny it altogether.

Get A Copy Of The Police Report - You should request a copy of the police report as soon as possible. Your attorney will need this documentation as well as your medical provider if you want to make sure you’re not paying out-of-pocket for any of your treatment.

Hire A Top-Rated Harlem Auto Accident Law Firm - Do not wait to hire a car accident lawyer to help with your case. The sooner you get in touch with an attorney, the sooner you can rest easy knowing your claim is being handled with the utmost care.

What Is The Average Car Accident Settlement In Harlem?

Every car accident is different, which means every accident victim will be eligible for a different amount of compensation based on the circumstances of their accident.

Car Accident Lawyers help accident victims obtain compensation for both economic and non-economic losses.

Economic damages are intended to compensate the victim for monetary losses.

Generally speaking, these types of damages are easier to prove since documentation can be provided with evidence of loss.

For example:

Past and Future Medical Expenses:Proven with medical records, diagnoses, treatment plans, and bills.

Lost Wages and Future Lost Wages:Proven by pay stubs, doctors’ notes stating time missed at work, and a letter from the employer.

Property Damage:Proven by receipts and invoices.

Out-of-Pocket Expenses:Proven by receipts and may include any expenses accumulated as a direct result of the accident.

Non-economic damages can be a bit trickier to prove. These damages include non-monetary losses. For example:

Pain and Suffering

Physical Disfigurement or Impairment

Loss of Enjoyment of Life

Mental Anguish

These are the losses that can be very difficult to prove without the help of an experienced lawyer.

Trying to obtain compensation for these losses on your own is nearly impossible. Your attorney will know what needs to be said and given to the insurance company to prove that you deserve to be compensated for these losses.

How Much Does It Cost To Hire An Auto Accident Attorney?

A lawyer that handles car accident injuries is called a Personal Injury Lawyer.

Personal Injury Lawyers understand that getting in an accident is a difficult time and that victims should be able to focus on healing from their injuries.

This is why PI Lawyers work on a contingency fee basis.

A contingency fee basis means that you do not pay anything upfront.

You only pay if the attorney can get you compensation. When the award is given, the attorney will take a percentage for legal fees.

What Are Common Causes Of Car Accidents?

Our experienced car accident injury lawyers represent nearly every type of motor vehicle accident. Here is a list of the most common causes of car accidents that our referred car accident attorneys represent:

Distracted Driving

Distracted driving is one of the top reasons car accidents occur on a daily basis.

Many people have become accustomed to answering their phones, responding to text messages, programming their GPS devices, changing the radio station, putting on makeup, or even eating or drinking.

Unfortunately, when the driver’s attention is taken from the road for any reason, a car accident is much more likely to occur. Even if the eyes are only averted for a second, that’s all it takes for an accident to happen.

Speeding

Speeding is such a common problem; there’s always someone in a hurry to be somewhere!

The biggest problem with speeding is the ability to stop suddenly is much more difficult if you’re going too fast. Stopping suddenly at high speeds is also extremely dangerous if the weather conditions are less than favorable that day. So many accidents could be avoided if everyone followed the rules of the road.

Driving Under the Influence

Driving under the influence of drugs or alcohol is another top reason when accidents occur.

Anytime you’re impaired, your ability to react while driving is greatly diminished. Even with the accessibility of Uber and Lyft, these types of accidents still occur all too frequently.

Weather

Unfortunatley, the weather often plays a huge role when it comes to auto accidents.

Excessive rain, snow, or sleet can easily cause a driver to lose control and cause an accident. Driving with extreme caution during bad weather is the best way to avoid causing an accident.

What If I Don't Feel Pain After The Accident?

If you were involved in a car accident, you should be examined for injuries. Some injuries, such as whiplash, do not present themselves immediately.

If you have injuries that are not treated, they could lead to more complications in the future.

If you do have injuries that present themselves later but were not documented by a doctor, they may be excluded from your injury case, and you will not be compensated for medical expenses.

Will I Have To Go To Trial For My Car Wreck Case?

If you hire a car accident lawyer, you most likely will not have to go to trial.

Most motor vehicle accident cases can be settled outside of court.

Your attorney will discuss the options with you, and if it means going to trial to get the best outcome, they are prepared to fight for you.
